text_content.text:
The academic year 2025-26 started off with  full excitement to visit H D Kote tribal kids to distribute 300 school bags, note books and stationeries on 19th and 20th July 2025 in association with Nisarga foundation.
Some generously had donated fun toys, paint boxes, crayons, colour pens & pencils, sketch pens, sanitary napkins, chocolates etc., to the kids

Some generously had donated fun toys, paint boxes, crayons, colour pens & pencils, sketch pens, sanitary napkins, chocolates etc., to the kids

text_content.text: On 9th  August 2025, the team was in  KGF to interview around 50 kids along with their guardians with respect to the scholarship.
The team interacted with kids and held various fun activities in spite of torrential rains.

text_content.text:
The team also conducted various fun activities with kids and an opportunity was provided to showcase the children talents like singing and dance. 

The team also distributed chocolates and biscuit packets.
On 11th October 2025, the team was in  Kolar to distribute school bags, note books and stationery items to Chronic Health Condition kids.
